plot: In this two-parter conclusion, the Tennysons struggle in outer space to prevent Earth from becoming Ghostfreak's darkened domain.

With three alien monsters working with a fourth, Ben is going to need more help from Gwen and Grandpa, but he's too stubborn to realize it. The aliens are trying to create a shield around the Earth to block the sun so that their master, Ghostfreak, will be at full power all the time. Team Tennyson must stop Ghostfreak's plans.—Jesse Sanchez
